text.section: On request of any person and payment of a registration fee set by the Board, the Board shall confirm the registration status and qualifications of any individual who is the subject of the request.

Each registration under this section:
shall include a statement of the registration status of the individual who is the subject of the request; and
may include:
information about the examination results and other qualifications of that individual;
information about the dates of issuance of the registration of that individual; and
information about any disciplinary action taken against that individual.
